items.question: How long does it take to set up my website?
items.answer: Most businesses can have their website up and running in under 15 minutes. Our streamlined process includes account creation, business details upload, template selection, and feature customization.

items.question: Do I need technical skills to use the platform?
items.answer: No technical skills required! Our platform is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly. Everything is drag-and-drop with guided setup wizards to help you through each step.

items.question: Can I customize the design and branding?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can customize colors, fonts, logos, and layout to match your brand. We offer industry-specific templates that you can personalize to create a unique look.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. We also offer flexible payment plans and a 30-day free trial to get you started.

items.question: Is there customer support available?
items.answer: Yes! We provide 24/7 customer support via live chat, email, and phone. Our team is here to help you succeed with your online business.

items.question: Can I integrate with other business tools?
items.answer: Yes, we offer integrations with popular business tools like QuickBooks, Mailchimp, Google Analytics, and more. Our API also allows for custom integrations.
